faq.question: Where was Ronaldo born?
faq.answer: Cristiano Ronaldo was born in Funchal, Madeira, Portugal, on February 5, 1985.

faq.question: What is Ronaldo's full name?
faq.answer: His full name is Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro.

faq.question: How many Ballon d'Or awards has Ronaldo won?
faq.answer: As of now, Cristiano Ronaldo has won 5 Ballon d'Or awards.

faq.question: What is Cristiano Ronaldo’s signature celebration?
faq.answer: Ronaldo’s famous celebration is the “Siuuu” jump and spin, followed by shouting "Siuuu" as he lands.

faq.question: What number does Cristiano Ronaldo usually wear?
faq.answer: Ronaldo is famously associated with the number 7, which has become part of his CR7 brand.

faq.question: Has Ronaldo won a FIFA World Cup?
faq.answer: No, Ronaldo has not won a FIFA World Cup, but he has represented Portugal in multiple editions of the tournament.

faq.question: What is Ronaldo's most famous goal?
faq.answer: One of Ronaldo's most famous goals is his bicycle kick against Juventus in the 2017-18 UEFA Champions League.
